ptt.gamerule.title: §6§lPlanc_'s Terrain Tweak (check out /ptt)
gamerule.pttBiomore.description: Makes ore generation with central tendency
gamerule.pttLayeredCave.description: Blocks near bedrock will be full of granite, and blocks in the middle will be full of diorite.
gamerule.pttRiver.description: Generate an Open Simplex river in the Overworld
gamerule.pttNetherHighway.description: Generate an Open Simplex highway in the Nether
gamerule.pttTheEndPath.description: Generate an Open Simplex path in The End Highlands
gamerule.pttTerrainType.description: (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED) Use custom terrain generation
ptt.export.successful: §aExport successful.§r Drag §nptt-config.properties§r into your server mod directory.
